question: Myanmar will sign pact with which country for the conservation of earthquake-damaged pagodas at Bagan?
explanation: India and Myanmar will sign a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) for the conservation of earthquake-damaged pagodas at Bagan during Prime Minister Narendra Modi\'s visit to Myanmar on September 6-7, 2017. Began is a renowned tourist attraction of Myanmar and India\'s role in rebuilding damaged pagodas at Began will be an opportunity to showcase India\'s expertise in the restoration and conservation of monuments not only to the people of Myanmar but also tourists from other countries. This pact will further strengthen India\'s enduring ties with Myanmar, in culture and religion.
